sentences.sentence: "You deserve to be a baroness, "said the collar.
sentences.translation: “你配得上做一个男爵夫人！”衬衫领子说。

sentences.sentence: "Loneliness touches almost every one of us at some point," its Minister for Loneliness Baroness Barran said.
sentences.translation: （英国）负责孤独问题的部长巴隆尼斯·巴伦说：“几乎每个人都会在某一个时刻感到孤独。”
